content: Speaking of which, when I worked as a restaurant chef in the Metropolis, I thought making tea was something time-consuming and pointless.

content: Back in the Academia, I also studied a thing or two about Bubble World nurturing — I just never expected to practice that knowledge one day.

content: Hoho, like everyone else, this is also a first for me. I just know a little bit more, that's all.
info: 莫白任务通用闲聊_莫白任务闲聊

content: Glenn asked me when the Astralink would get a hair saloon. I feel like my hair has grown...（挠挠刘海）

content: I saw a broke down car from another Neo Astralink in the maelstrom yesterday. It had several relocating neighbors inside.

content: That's a secret for now.

content: Esassani? Hohoho... joined only just last week. Ah, my apologies. She's relatively new, but please be assured!

content: As for me... hoho~ This situation will change once everyone has a proper venue for their respective jobs.

content: This Astralink connected dozens of Bubble World Stations all around into a stable and unified life district.
info: 莫白任务通用闲聊_莫白任务闲聊

content: Probably because... {短暂停}I never really put down roots anywhere back then, hohoho. But that was in the past.
info: 莫白任务通用闲聊_莫白任务闲聊

content: Now, I'm honored to have the chance to build the Astralink together with all of you. The place we live in now — that's what truly matters.
info: 莫白任务通用闲聊_莫白任务闲聊

content: Before building the Astralink Station, the most important thing is getting our lives here in order. There's still a lot to prepare, and once everyone is settled, I'll introduce everything step by step.
info: 莫白任务通用闲聊_莫白任务闲聊

content: If they succeeded... Because later on, they wanted the district to be more mechanical, and then later, maybe a bit more artistic flair...
info: 莫白任务通用闲聊_莫白任务闲聊

content: Because they believe the friendliest aspect of their Astralink, is the cute smile of a stingray.
info: 莫白任务通用闲聊_莫白任务闲聊

content: I've been dealing with Loomi Co. for years, but I only joined the Neo Astralink last month, hoho~! Glenn joined two weeks after me.
info: 莫白任务通用闲聊_莫白任务闲聊

content: Everyone has gone through professional coordinator training. Twenty years ago, when the Neo Astralink just begun, there had been many unexpected incidents.
info: 莫白任务通用闲聊_莫白任务闲聊

content: Losing contact with relocating neighbors was common occurrence.
info: 莫白任务通用闲聊_莫白任务闲聊

content: Ah, allow me to elaborate. Coordinators are at the Camp around the clock, but that doesn't mean we don't rest at all, hoho.
info: 莫白任务通用闲聊_莫白任务闲聊

content: How do we manage to return to post before you all start wandering about? Hohoho... That is a deep topic to dive into.

content: When can I go visit?
info: 莫白任务通用闲聊_莫白任务闲聊

content: So I'm remembering all the Astralinks I visted before. The Neo Astralink Wave had been going for many years, and there are all kinds of Astralinks.

content: Sani would love it!
info: 莫白任务通用闲聊_莫白任务闲聊

content: This really isn't an easy task, hohoho... But don't worry, we'll take our time. Sooner or later, we'll figure out what we truly want.

content: Oh, my apologies. There will be a hair saloon, of course. We will have everything.

content: After our Astralink Station and Neighborhood Center are constructed and everyone has settled into the rhythm of living here...

content: Hoho, of course, it's hard for me to ask for <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s help for such trivial matter.

content: All maelstrom appear insignificant around this life district.

content: Hohoho, once our <color=#8AAB4B>Astralink Station</color> is built, you'll always have the chance to go wherever you want.

content: They threw everything they thought was good together and were reluctant to give anything up. It was difficult for the giant body to make progress, and so all those who saw no hope left.

content: Ah, don't worry. They are still working hard at it! I believe one day, they will find their original goal, and build the ideal district.

content: {想象中}I'm thinking about something. What is special about our Astralink?

content: Ho? Isn't this just the perfect length?
